Dating: 30TH DYNASTY (not after); LATE PERIOD; 26TH DYNASTY (not before)
Name: Cult symbol
Description: This object is composed of a slab in the form of a stela or a of a shield bearing a depiction of two crossed arrows in highly raised relief. The back has a slightly convex surface which is left undecorated. The stela is crowned by a carefully sculpted bull's head with a wig and a solar disk set between its horns.
